name: Offroad 8x8 Truck Driver - Hill Driving Simulator
name_original: Offroad 8x8 Truck Driver - Hill Driving Simulator
description:
It's a 2017 winter season and it's time to drive in snow but this time in a unique way of driving a Big Truck which is 8x8 wheeler! So Fasten your seat belt and get ready for the drive as a Mountain Truck Driver. Off-road Drive lets you become a real truck driver on dirt as well as snowy hill areas! Be careful on the bumpy roads, your one wrong turn can cause a huge truck destruction.

Off road Uphill truck is the unique simulation game. It's a endless truck game, Steer your 8X8 Wheeler to the destination and unlock new challenging levels. if you love mountain simulator truck driving games on off road then this one is for you! Conquer the high mountains!

So have fun and improve your simulator Driving skills on snowy hills and happy driving in winters! Enjoy!


Features
- Its Free for life time!
- This offroad driving is endless.
- Real sounds and visual effects of 8x8 wheels
- Smooth and Realistic Game play
- Realistic driving and parking experience
- Extremely challenging missions for
- Drive the Big Trucks uphill for Free!
- Real 3D Graphics for bumpy tracks and 8x8 wheeled rigid vehicles, that makes game a real life experience.
